title: "Kukuku....... Yatsu wa Shitennou no Naka demo Saijaku" to Kaiko sareta Ore, Naze ka Yuusha to Seijo no Shishou ni Naru
altTitle: "Kukuku....... He Is the Weakest of the Four Heavenly Monarchs." I Was Dismissed From My Job, but Somehow I Became the Master of a Hero and a Holy Maiden
Kukuku... The Weakest of the Elite Four
「ククク……。奴は四天王の中でも最弱」と解雇された俺、なぜか勇者と聖女の師匠になる
